scripts.script: CREATE TABLE [TableA] ( SysId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL , ColumnA NVARCHAR(25) , ColumnB NVARCHAR(25) )
CREATE TABLE [TableB] ( SysId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL , ColumnC NVARCHAR(25) , ColumnD NVARCHAR(25) )
INSERT INTO [TableB] ( SysId , ColumnC , ColumnD ) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Hello', 'World')
